main event: A 100 ft balloon was sighted at 15,000 ft over Sarasota, Florida.
interesting points: The object was tracked on radar for 15 minutes.
The object was silver in color and spinning.
The object disappeared above the 15,000 ft level.
The object was determined to be a weather balloon launched from Tampa, Florida.
The report includes details about another sighting by a Sarasota, Florida housewife, but no other specific details are provided.
